content.question: Based on the map above, which of the following best explains why the Atacama Desert has a consistently arid climate?

choices.label: It is on the windward side of the Andes Mountains.
It is in the rain shadow of the Andes Mountains.
The cold Peru Current brings dry air to the west coast.
Compared to the east coast, it has less water available.

content.answer: It is in the rain shadow of the Andes Mountains.
